settings.ekit_heading_title: Hi I'm {{ALOK}} , Graphic Designer and Website Developer

settings.editor: I design and code beautifully simple things and i love what i do. Just simple like that!

settings.ekit_heading_title: Here, i am dedicated to serve you the  {{Best service!}}

settings.editor: Welcome to my portfolio, I am  Alok Kumar and i am a professional graphic and website developer . You are at the right place sir/mam it's a space where dedication meets excellence. I am truly honored to share my journey of unwavering commitment and passion for delivering the best. I had served my website and graphic designing service to more than 17 international clints (mostly from USA) and they got very beautiful and boosted results in their business in short span of time . I designs sales driven websites for my clients and many of my clients gets very positive results in their business after getting my service . I want to tell you one thing with 100% guarantee that your website will be better than your competitor it's my promise. In the last , I just want to say  I like your attitude that you are here . Explore my Portfolio..!
I build website go Live and ensure that website is sales driven
I love graphic designing , i had done 100's of projects on designing . you can explore those designs here in my portfolio.
Increase the traffic for your website with SEO optimized and also provide digital marketing services

ekit_testimonial_data.review: "I am thrilled with the exceptional website designed by Alok for me! Alok's creativity, attention to detail, and dedication to delivering exactly what I need, truly impressed me.  My website now stands out beautifully . Thankyou Alok, for your outstanding service!"

I got my website on 3rd March .The website is not only visually appealing but also user-friendly,  and make my business more Professional. My gym's online presence has received a significant boost, all thanks to Alok's exceptional website designing service. Highly recommended!

I had the pleasure of working with Alok for my spa center's graphic designing needs. The designs perfectly capture the essence of my spa, creating a soothing and inviting atmosphere for my clients.I'm thrilled with the graphics and highly recommend Alok for anyone seeking top-notch design work. Thank you, Alok, for enhancing my spa's brand with your incredible talent!

I'm absolutely delighted with Alok's graphic designing service! Alok crafted an outstanding real estate ad poster for me that exceeded all my expectations.I'm thrilled to have a stunning poster to attract potential buyers. If you're looking for a skilled and reliable graphic designer, Alok is the one to go to. Thanks Alok, for your fantastic work!

I am very happy to working with alok. Alok created stunning website for my beauty parlour! Alok's expertise and skill transformed my ideas into a stunning online reality.. I'm so glad I chose Alok for this project, and I can't wait for everyone to see my beautiful new website. Thank Alok, for your realsistic work for me.

settings.html:
<style>

body,html{
    overflow-x: hidden !important;
    
    
   
}




.left-side-button:hover .elementor-icon-list-text {
    color: #28e98c !important;
}

.left-side-button:hover a .elementor-icon-list-icon  svg{
   fill: #28e98c!important;
}



.hero-section  img {
    display: block;
    animation: rotating 6s infinite linear;
}

.menu-highlight .active a .elementor-icon-list-icon svg {
   fill: #28e98c !important;
}

/* @Keyframe */
@keyframes rotating {
    0% {
        transform: rotate(0);
    }
    100% {
        transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
}


.timeline h2{
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: 300;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    color: #fff;
}


.service-item:hover  .projects .elementor-heading-title  {
    text-decoration: underline !important;
}



.price span{
    font-size: 24px;
    color: #999999;
}










[data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .e-con:not(.sidebar-section),
[data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .elementor-section-wrap > .e-con:not(.sidebar-section){
    margin-left: 400px !important;
    width: calc(100% - 475px) !important
    
   
}
  
  
  
.elementor-top-section{
    position: fixed;
    width: 420px;
    
}
.left-sidebar{
    padding: 50px !important;
    
}

  
@media only screen and (max-width: 1550px) {
    [data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .e-con:not(.sidebar-section),
[data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .elementor-section-wrap > .e-con:not(.sidebar-section){
    margin-left: 350px !important;
    width: calc(100% - 370px) !important
    
}

.left-sidebar{
    padding: 30px !important;
    
}
.elementor-top-section{
    width: 370px;
}
}


@media only screen and (max-width: 1199px) {
    .elementor-top-section{
        margin-left:0;
    }
    
    [data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .e-con:not(.sidebar-section),
[data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .elementor-section-wrap > .e-con:not(.sidebar-section){
    margin-left: 360px !important;
    width: calc(100% - 350px) !important
    
}
}



@media only screen and (max-width: 1024px) {
    [data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .e-con:not(.sidebar-section),
    [data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .elementor-section-wrap > .e-con:not(.sidebar-section){
        margin-left: 0px !important;
        width: 100% !important;
    }
    /* Remove position: fixed for mobile devices */
    .elementor-top-section{
        position: static !important;
        width: 1000px;
    }
    
    /*
    .menu-bar{
        position: fixed !important;
    } */
}

}
</style>


<script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.6.1/jquery.min.js"></script>


<script>


var className = 'menu-highlight',
    $ =jQuery,
    clickLock = false

$(document).ready(function(){

$('.' + className + ' .elementor-icon-list-item').on('click', function(){
    $('.' + className + ' .elementor-icon-list-item').removeClass('active')
    $(this).addClass('active')
    clickLock = true
    setTimeout(function(){
        clickLock = false
    },500)
})
})

$(window).on('load scroll', function(){
    
    if( clickLock ) return
    
    var ids = [],
        id
    
    $('.elementor-top-section, [data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .e-con, [data-elementor-type="wp-page"] > .e-container').each(function(){
        if($(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height() - 350 > $(this).offset().top){
            ids.push($(this).attr('id'))
        }
    })
    
    ids = ids.filter(element => {
      return element !== undefined
    })
    
    id = ids[ids.length - 1]
    
    $('.elementor-icon-list-item').removeClass('active')
    $('[href="#'+id+'"]').parent().addClass('active')
})


</script>
